golad.bot

Interface Bot


  • public interface Bot
    The interface every J_GOLAD bot must implement to meet the specifications of this API.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endGame(Boolean win)
      Notifies the bot that the game has ended.
      Move getNextMove(MoveFactory factory, Move lastOpponentMove)
      Obtains the next move this bot will make in the given situation.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextMove

        Move getNextMove(MoveFactory factory,
               Move lastOpponentMove)
        Obtains the next move this bot will make in the given situation.
        Parameters:
        factory - A MoveFactory to create and validate moves, and to obtain the current state of the Board.
        lastOpponentMove - The last Move the opponent made, or null if this is the first Move of the game
        Returns:
        The next move of the player controlled by this Bot. If null or invalid, the current game is to be instantly lost.

      • endGame

        void endGame(Boolean win)
        Notifies the bot that the game has ended.
        Parameters:
        win - True, if this Bot has won the game; false, if this bot has lost the game; null, if the game ended in a draw.
